description: This file defines an Angular service 'AuthService' responsible for managing user authentication, including login, logout, token retrieval, and authentication status. It interacts with an authentication store and performs HTTP requests to a backend API or simulates responses.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Angular service providing authentication functionalities such as login, logout, token management, and user info.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login by sending credentials to backend API or simulating success if environment.apiBaseUrl is not configured. Stores session data upon success.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears session data and navigates user to login page.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Returns the current authentication token from the store or null if not authenticated.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks whether the user is currently authenticated.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Returns information about the current user or null if not authenticated.

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^        user: { id: '1', email: payload.emailOrUsername, name: 'Demo User' }$/
